### Part 2
```{r}
mind.data = read.csv("Mind.csv")
mind.table = table(mind.data)
mind.table
```

```{r}
mind.test = chisq.test(mind.data$Treatment, mind.data$Improve, correct = FALSE)
```

```{r}
eij = mind.test$expected

eij
```

```{r}
chi.sq.obs = as.numeric(mind.test$statistic)

chi.sq.obs
```
